display_long_description:
# Spatial Camera
## **Version 0.2.0 released with huge updates**
## **JOIN OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY🔗** to see more.
https://discord.gg/wDVr6SZgUw

# **Experience your memories in a whole new dimension.**

With **Spatial Camera**, you can capture, save, and relive your moments in stunning 3D stereo. Using your Meta Quest, the app records both **stereoscopic videos** and **stereo photos**, bringing depth and realism that standard cameras simply can’t achieve.

## Key Features

* 🎥 **Record in 3D** – Capture videos that feel alive with depth.
* 📸 **Take 3D Photos** – Preserve stills in true stereoscopic form.
* 📂 **Save to Gallery** – Export photos and videos directly to your native gallery.
* 🖼️ **Built-in Viewer** – Watch your captures instantly in immersive 3D.
* 🔄 **Simple & Intuitive** – Designed for easy recording, browsing, and sharing.
[media]
Whether you’re recording everyday memories, documenting travel adventures, or saving once-in-a-lifetime experiences, Spatial Camera gives you the power to relive them with a sense of presence that 2D media cannot match.

Step into your memories. With Spatial Camera, your moments aren’t just captured—they’re *experienced*.

---

# **Experience your memories in a whole new dimension.**

With **Spatial Camera**, you can capture, save, and relive your moments in stunning 3D stereo. Using your Meta Quest, the app records both **stereoscopic videos** and **stereo photos**, bringing depth and realism that standard cameras simply can’t achieve.

## Key Features
